name: Bose Solo 5 TV sound system - Black | Dell USA
description: The Bose Solo 5 TV sound system is a one-piece soundbar that brings noticeably better sound to all your favorite TV programs. It’s engineered to help clearly reproduce everything from dialogue to details. And for even more clarity, its dialogue mode makes every word easier to hear. This soundbar is so versatile you can place it almost anywhere. And with Bluetooth® connectivity, you can play your favorite music wirelessly through the speaker, too.
